details.title: System engineering artifacts for SoS
details.abstract: This describes a system of systems (SoS) systems engineering (SE) artifacts, compares and contrasts them with similar ones developed and used for individual systems, and explains how they are used to guide SoS engineering processes. This concludes with next steps for using SoS artifacts to continue maturing the understanding of SoS SE in an international cooperative effort with the United Kingdom, Australia, and Canada.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
